attributes.action: cease the underfunding of our Armed Forces during a period of active operations.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Treasury refuses to fully fund the Armed Forces operations in Iraq and Afghanistan.  As a result each of the Services is facing severe cuts and shortages.  Training is having to be called off, units are having to be scrapped and vital purchases delayed.  The Army cannot meet its supply needs, the RAF is having to scrap active squadrons and the Navy is trying to operate with less than the minimum number of ships needed for operations - and still more cuts are demanded.  This must stop.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
